subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mary Rucker-Thomas is the keeper of the family flame, fueled by the memory of her husband, Holcombe Rucker, who engaged disadvantaged African-Americans in Harlem through basketball.
snippet: Mary Rucker-Thomas is the keeper of the family flame, fueled by the memory of her husband, Holcombe Rucker, who engaged disadvantaged African-Americans in Harlem through basketball.
